channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 3–5 July 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 15–21 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 16–21 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (RE): 8–11 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 3–4 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 1 seats
  • UK Independence Party (ID): 0 seats
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1–4 seats
  • Brexit Party (NI): 17–19 seats
  • Change UK (RE): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for The Observer, 3–5 July 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Change UK (RE): 0.6–1.5%
